name: Root harnesk
desc: Finely wrought and strong enough to even turn the sharpest of blades.

name: Bronzehead arrow
desc: Sharper than flint. A sleek messenger of death.

name: Carapace arrow
desc: Heavy and pointy, this one's gonna hurt.

name: Charred arrow
desc: This arrow has been whittled into shape from a charred femur, and it's as hard as any metal.

name: Fire arrow
desc: This arrow burns whatever it pierces.

name: Flinthead arrow
desc: A hide-breaker with a head of flint.

name: Frost arrow
desc: A shard of piercing ice.

name: Ironhead arrow
desc: Capped with iron and flighted with dark feathers.

name: Needle arrow
desc: The final stitch.

name: Obsidian arrow
desc: A sliver of darkness.

name: Poison arrow
desc: A bitter sting from afar.

name: Silver arrow
desc: A needle to calm restless spirits.

name: Wood arrow
desc: An arrow of sharpened wood.

name: Stone axe
desc: A crude axe for tree-felling.

name: Flint axe
desc: Sharper than stone.

name: Bronze axe
desc: A bright and burnished blade, curved like a smile.

name: Iron axe
desc: Sharp and strong, a woodcutter's friend.

name: Blackmetal axe
desc: A perfectly-balanced axe forged from dark metal with an emerald sheen.

name: Jotun Bane
desc: Not even the giants of old could weather the poisonous bite of this weapon.

name: Berserkir axes
desc: Let your rage take over and face the slaughter.

name: Battleaxe
desc: Skull-splitter, a warrior's joy.

name: Crystal battleaxe
desc: It's see-through and tears through.

name: Trollstav
desc: Summons a raging beast to cause death and destruction.

name: Staff of Protection
desc: For a slight blood offering it will protect the caster in a magical shell.

name: Dead Raiser
desc: Sacrifice a bit of blood to raise the dead. Upgrade the skull to spawn multiple skeletons, and increase your blood magic to make them stronger.

name: Blackmetal bolt
desc: A sleek bolt of dark metal.

name: Bone bolt
desc: A crude bolt of yellowed bone.

name: Carapace bolt
desc: A heavy and solid bolt.

name: Charred bolt
desc: A sturdy bone from a forearm, shaped into a deadly bolt.

name: Iron bolt
desc: A sturdy iron missile.

name: Bile bomb
desc: Handle with care.

name: Ooze bomb
desc: The stench is unbearable...

name: Smoke bomb
desc: Everyone knows you can't breathe in the smoke.

name: Spinesnap
desc: Using this bow is backbreaking work but so worth it.

name: Crude bow
desc: A crude but functional bow.

name: Ash Fang
desc: Risen again from the ashes, this bow holds unyielding strength.

name: Draugr Fang
desc: Dark wood strung with glistening sinew. A vicious thing.

name: Finewood bow
desc: A simple bow of strong and supple wood.

name: Huntsman bow
desc: Finely worked and strung. A huntsman's joy.

name: Torch
desc: It brings light and warmth, drives back the darkness.

name: Club
desc: A crude but useful weapon.

name: Bronze mace
desc: A headache on a stick.

name: Iron mace
desc: A fist-sized lump of iron on a wooden shaft.

name: Frostner
desc: The dead fear silver. Remind them why.

name: Porcupine
desc: A deadly weapon, bristling with fiendish spikes.

name: Flametal mace
desc: Dense yet spiked flametal, perfect for bashing enemy faces in.

name: Stagbreaker
desc: A weapon worthy of the Gods! If you get hit with this, you'll know itâ€¦

name: Iron sledge
desc: A mighty hammer, worthy of a champion.

name: Demolisher
desc: This mighty sledge yearns to wreak havoc.

name: Spice rack
desc: Cauldron improvement

name: Forge
desc: Crafting station

name: Forge bellows
desc: Forge improvement

name: Anvils
desc: Forge improvement

name: Forge cooler
desc: Forge improvement

name: Mead ketill
desc: Crafting station

name: Cauldron
desc: Crafting station

name: Workbench
desc: Crafting station

name: Chopping block
desc: Workbench improvement

name: Tanning rack
desc: Workbench improvement

name: Adze
desc: Workbench improvement

name: Tool shelf
desc: Workbench improvement

name: Arbalest
desc: A slow but powerful weapon.

name: Ripper
desc: Rips your foes apart, simple as that.

name: Staff of Fracturing
desc: Only those with patience and focus will be able to harness the true power of this staff.

name: Staff of Embers
desc: The sweltering heat of Muspelheim seems almost pathetic when compared to what this staff can do...

name: Staff of the Wild
desc: Ancient natural forces lie curled and dormant within this staff, ready to be unleashed.

name: Staff of Frost
desc: A staff as cold as the three-year winter that will herald the end of times.

name: Dundr
desc: What happens next may shock you.

name: Paws of the Bear
desc: Made for tearing and rending.

name: Flesh Rippers
desc: If claws work for wolves, why not for a viking?

name: Blueberries
desc: Tiny but tasty.

name: Cloudberries
desc: The gold of the forest.

name: Fiddlehead
desc: Veggies with a twist!

name: Jotun puffs
desc: Swollen with magic, these golden orbs bubble from the ground where the Jotun fell.

name: Smoke puff
desc: Hopefully it tastes better after cooking.

name: Raspberries
desc: Sweet and delicious.

name: Dyrnwyn blade fragment
desc: Parts of an old blade. If all the pieces were reassembled it could likely be made whole.

name: Dyrnwyn hilt fragment
desc: The hilt of a long forgotten sword. Perhaps it could reforged if one had all the piecesâ€¦

name: Dyrnwyn tip fragment
desc: This shard of metal looks like the tip of a sword. One might be able to reforge the blade if more pieces are foundâ€¦

name: Blackmetal knife
desc: A darkling blade. Strong and sharp.

name: Butcher knife
desc: A butcher's knife designed specifically for slaughtering tamed animals.

name: Abyssal razor
desc: A knife from the deep.

name: Copper knife
desc: A glittering copper knife.

name: Flint knife
desc: Sharpened flint. A reliable tool.

name: Silver knife
desc: A savage piece of pain.

name: Skoll and Hati
desc: Stab once for those who've betrayed you, and twice for those you hate.

name: Asksvin bladder
desc: An acidic smell still lingers. Prominently.

name: Asksvin hide
desc: This sturdy leather is thick, and still warm to the touch

name: Bell fragment
desc: This ancient fragment appears to be a piece of a broken bell...

name: Bilebag
desc: Caustic bile drawn from the corpse of a gjall.

name: Bear hide
desc: A thick and furry hide, coarse yet incredibly soft.

name: Bear meat
desc: This fatty meat was once meant to sustain a body through hibernation.

name: Bear paw
desc: Sharp claws suitable for picking berries â€“ or for dismembering.

name: Black core
desc: Filled to the brim with ancient power.

name: Black marble
desc: A block of solid stone, seamed with shifting colors.

name: Bloodbag
desc: The contents of a leech. Ick!

name: Bone fragments
desc: A pile of shattered bones.

name: Bonemaw tooth
desc: This has caused the death of many a brave sailor.

name: Bronze nails
desc: Used in construction of ships and furniture.

name: Seeker meat
desc: When you crack open their shells, the meat within is tender and succulent.
usage: Cauldron , Iron cooking station , Food preparation table

name: Carapace
desc: A plate of chitinous armor.

name: Celestial feather
desc: The only remnant of the fallen valkyrie's former self.

name: Ceramic plate
desc: No matter how hot this gets, the other side of it remains strangely cool.

name: Chain
desc: A link of iron chain.

name: Charred bone
desc: Followed by the distinct smell of burnt meat

name: Chitin
desc: A shard of crustacean shell.

name: Coal
desc: A lump of coal.

name: Crystal
desc: A shard of crystal from deep within the earth.

name: Deer hide
desc: A cleaned hide from a deer.

name: Dragon tear
desc: The last frozen tear of a dragon, pulsating with mysterious energy.

name: Sealbreaker fragment
desc: A fragment of a Dvergr sealbreaker.

name: Refined eitr
desc: This is the stuff of life, the poison that consumes itself. The Dvergr refine it to use in their esoteric designs.

name: Feathers
desc: A small pile of feathers.

name: Flax
desc: Unspun fibers from a flax plant.

name: Flint
desc: Can be shaped into sharp blades.

name: Freeze gland
desc: This mysterious organ keeps a perfect temperature.

name: Iolite
desc: Light is reflected sharply off of this gem, or does it come from within the stone itself?

name: Jade
desc: This gem pulses with energy, almost as if it were a living thing.

name: Bloodstone
desc: You wonder how many deals have been made to appease this gem. How many palms have bled onto it in exchange for its power?

name: Blood clot
desc: Be careful not to puncture this while you carry it...

name: Greydwarf eye
desc: The milky eyeball of a Greydwarf.

name: Guck
desc: It smells like fermented fish.

name: Hare meat
desc: The meat of a hare is scant but toothsome.

name: Iron nails
desc: Needed for advanced construction projects.

name: Leather scraps
desc: A small pile of leather scraps.

name: Linen thread
desc: A fine linen thread made out of a strong flax filament.

name: Mandible
desc: The hand of a man could hardly design a more perfect weapon.

name: Morgen sinew
desc: Chewy.

name: Needle
desc: The pointy end of a Deathsquito.

name: Obsidian
desc: Dark volcanic glass.

name: Ooze
desc: Rotten and putrid-smelling. Why do you want this?

name: Proustite powder
desc: This unstable powder packs great potential.

name: Queen Bee
desc: The queen of the bees!

name: Majestic carapace
desc: Her majesty's will was hard and unrelenting, but this piece of carapace is perhaps even more so.

name: Resin
desc: Sticky tree resin that insulates well. If put to the flame it burns slow and steady.

name: Root
desc: An old root from an ancient tree stump. It feels both flexible and durable at the same time.

name: Sap
desc: Sacred blood from the Great Tree.

name: Scale hide
desc: A pelt of glittering scales.

name: Serpent scale
desc: The shiny metal-like scale from a sea serpent.

name: Stone
desc: It's a rock.

name: Sulfur
desc: Smells like rotten eggs.

name: Surtling core
desc: It throbs with inner heat.

name: Troll hide
desc: A thick and sturdy hide. This is why trolls are so hard to kill.

name: Wisp
desc: It keeps whispering jibberish...

name: Fenris claw
desc: It is hard and sharp like iron.

name: Wolf fang
desc: Still sharp.

name: Fenris hair
desc: A bundle of thick, rough hair. It has a strong smell.

name: Ymir flesh
desc: The earthy remains of the giant Ymir.

name: Frost resistance mead
desc: Protects against the cold.

name: Black metal
desc: A heavy bar of dark metal.

name: Bronze
desc: A strong alloy of copper and tin.

name: Copper
desc: A bar of pure copper ready to be worked.

name: Flametal
desc: According to legend, this metal was used by the gods themselves to craft powerful weapons.

name: Iron
desc: A bar of pure iron ready to be worked.

name: Silver
desc: A bar of pure silver ready to be worked.

name: Tin
desc: A bar of pure tin ready to be worked.

name: Swamp Key
desc: Partly covered in caked mud, it smells foetid.

name: Cultivator
desc: A farming tool for tilling soil.

name: Totem
desc: Channels the ancient power of Yagluth.

name: Stone Portal
desc: The powerful energy source lets you pass through even with the most valuable of items.
usage: Teleports players to a connected portal.

name: Portal
desc: Connects to another portal with equal or no tag.
usage: Teleports players to a connected portal.

name: Black metal missile
desc: These thick missiles can punch through the hide of even the toughest of foes.

name: Flametal missile
desc: Forged from one of the hardest metals in all of Valheim, this missile is sure to hold off your enemies.

name: Wooden missile
desc: Sturdy wooden missiles that can provide a tough defense against foes.

name: Antler Pickaxe
desc: This tool is hard enough to crack even the most stubborn rocks.

name: Bronze atgeir
desc: A true warrior's tool.

name: Iron atgeir
desc: Blood-drinker, skull-cracker, death-bringer.

name: Blackmetal atgeir
desc: A vicious hewing-axe of almost unbreakable black metal.

name: Himminafl
desc: It might not be a hammer, but Thor himself would still approve of this weapon.

name: Barley
desc: A bundle of barley.

name: Carrot seeds
desc: Plant these if you like carrots...

name: Onion seeds
desc: Plant to grow a healthy onion.

name: Turnip seeds
desc: Plant to grow a healthy turnip.

name: Wood tower shield
desc: A rough but heavy wooden shield.

name: Bone tower shield
desc: The bones of dead warriors make for a good protection.

name: Wood shield
desc: A simple wooden shield.

name: Iron tower shield
desc: A tall shield of strong iron.

name: Serpent scale shield
desc: A sturdy shield of overlapping scales.

name: Bronze buckler
desc: A shield of burnished bronze, good to turn a blade or two.

name: Black metal tower shield
desc: A tower shield of gleaming dark metal.

name: Banded shield
desc: Banded with hoops of iron, a true warrior's companion.

name: Iron buckler
desc: Its lightness and curved center makes it excellent for deflecting attacks.

name: Silver shield
desc: A shield of radiant silver.

name: Black metal shield
desc: Fashioned from the strongest metal, able to turn even the deadliest blades.

name: Carapace shield
desc: The almost unbreakable carapace of your enemies makes an excellent shield.

name: Carapace buckler
desc: The skull of a seeker is solid but not heavy, which makes it perfect for a small and agile shield.

name: Flametal shield
desc: The shield is and always will be a viking's most important weapon.

name: Flint spear
desc: If your eye marks a thing for death, let your arm send the messenger.

name: Bronze spear
desc: A sturdy spear with a head of burnished bronze.

name: Ancient bark spear
desc: Despite its gnarled look, this spear is strong and perfectly balanced.

name: Fang spear
desc: Even in death, the wolf's tooth aches for flesh.

name: Carapace spear
desc: Sharpened to jagged perfection, this spear is sure to be deadly.

name: Splitnir
desc: Split your enemies' hearts in two.

name: Bronze sword
desc: Blood-drinker. A thirsty friend.

name: Iron sword
desc: The straight line between life and death runs along the edge of this blade.

name: Silver sword
desc: Purest of metals, nothing unclean can abide its touch.

name: Blackmetal sword
desc: A thing of death and beauty. It catches the light with a greenish glow.

name: Mistwalker
desc: The faint glow seems to slice through the mist.

name: Dyrnwyn
desc: The sword that was broken is whole once more. Its flames burn hot, fuelled by the memories of ancient warriors.

name: NidhÃ¶gg
desc: Named after the evil dragon that dwells by the roots of the world tree, this sword heralds doom for those who cross its path.

name: NidhÃ¶gg the Bleeding
desc: If you bleed, your foes are sure to do so as well.

name: NidhÃ¶gg the Thundering
desc: The power of lightning dances along the blade of this sword, a promise of the pain to come.

name: NidhÃ¶gg the Primal
desc: Tangle your foes in roots, like the namesake of this blade.

name: Krom
desc: As deadly as it is shiny, and it's very shiny.

name: Slayer
desc: This mighty blade thirsts for the blood of foes.

name: Brutal Slayer
desc: If it bleeds, you can kill it.

name: Scourging Slayer
desc: The lightning bound into this blade is erratic, ever searching for something to strike.

name: Primal Slayer
desc: The blade works in tandem with the primal forces of the world, seeking death and slaughter.

name: Deer Trophy
desc: A fine specimen but you'll need to kill more than deer to enter Valhalla.

name: Draugr Elite Trophy
desc: The dead stare of the glowing red eyes sends a shiver through your bones.

name: Troll Trophy
desc: The leathery skin bears the faded tracery of ancient symbols.

name: Skeleton Trophy
desc: The expressionless grin of this skull reminds you of the inevitability of death.

name: Ashwood
desc: Wood hardened by fire and ash.

name: Ancient bark
desc: An ancient and sturdy material.

name: Finewood
desc: High quality wood for fine carpentry.

name: Corewood
desc: Perfect for building log cabins.

name: Wood
desc: Good strong wood to build with.

name: Yggdrasil wood
desc: Godflesh, wood from the Great Tree.
